alert.note: Alert for Greene (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greene and northwestern Lenoir Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Fremont, or 8 miles northeast of Goldsboro, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinston, Snow Hill, Institute, Jason, Lizzie, Castoria, Fort Run VFD, Shine and Bull Head VFD. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
